SELECT I01.create_time, I01.type, I01.user_desc, I01.status, I01.gp_consume, I01.personal_consume FROM ( SELECT 'GROUP' AS type, usr.nick_name AS user_desc, rel.status, UNIX_TIMESTAMP(rel.update_time) * 1000 as create_time, 0 as gp_consume, 0 as personal_consume FROM aiur_rel_user_group rel, aiur_users usr WHERE rel.user_id = usr.user_id AND rel.status IN ('PENDING', 'JOINED', 'LEFT') AND rel.group_id = #group_id:DECIMAL# UNION SELECT 'CONSUME' AS type, gc.description AS user_desc, gc.status, UNIX_TIMESTAMP(gc.update_time) * 1000 as create_time, gc.money as gp_consume, uc.money as personal_consume FROM aiur_group_consume gc, aiur_user_consume_detail uc WHERE gc.consume_id = uc.consume_id AND uc.user_id = #user_id:DECIMAL# AND gc.group_id = #group_id:DECIMAL# UNION SELECT 'INCOMING' as type, usr.nick_name AS user_desc, ui.status, UNIX_TIMESTAMP(ui.update_time) * 1000 as create_time, 0 as gp_consume, ui.money as personal_consume FROM aiur_user_incomming ui, aiur_users usr WHERE usr.user_id = ui.user_id AND ui.status in ('PENDING', 'OK') AND ui.group_id = #group_id:DECIMAL# ) I01 ORDER BY I01.create_time DESC
